Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1073.jpg'}
{1: 'Misono High', 2: 'Evening, May 2nd - Pleasant and Dry', 4: 'School Infirmary'}
{3: 'The curtains along the wall are drawn aside, revealing a hidden door that opens from within.'}
{3: 'The private ward is equipped with a single hospital bed and a window.'}
{3: 'Yuka rises from the bed, pressing a cotton ball against her right arm with her left hand.'}
{3: 'The school nurse disposes of the syringe and her used gloves in a nearby waste bin.'}
{3: 'The two make their way to the sofa in the infirmary.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Doctor', 3: "I heard you've been coughing up blood lately. Is this true?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "Yes. Ever since I started the medication, I've been coughing up blood occasionally.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Doctor', 3: 'Are you experiencing any other symptoms?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'Auditory hallucinations, visual hallucinations, and nightmares at night.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Doctor', 3: "I'll prescribe you some tranquilizers for these symptoms.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Doctor', 3: "But about the blood... we're already on the minimum dosage.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Doctor', 3: 'If we lower it any further, your body will severely reject the nanomachine implants.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Doctor', 3: "Your constitution doesn't seem suitable for these experiments. Your heart condition is particularly concerning.", 4: '1', 5: '·'}
{2: 'Doctor', 3: 'Was that third-party assessment report really accurate...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "I'm fine.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "I may be physically weak, but I'm determined to see these experiments through.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "Please don't worry about me. Just give me the appropriate dosage.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Doctor', 3: "Sigh... Well, then I suppose there's no point in hesitating.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Doctor', 3: "Don't forget to take your supplements and nutrients. You're looking quite pale.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "I'm always nauseous.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Doctor', 3: 'No, you have to take them, no matter what.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'Yes.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Yuka packs her various medicines into her schoolbag and leaves the infirmary.'}
{3: 'Watching Yuka leave, the school nurse slumps in her chair like a deflated balloon.'}
{3: 'With trembling hands, she takes out a pack of cigarettes from her drawer, pulls one out, then throws it in the trash.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Doctor', 3: 'This is ridiculous...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'As she turns back, the school nurse catches sight of the brown envelope in her drawer and freezes for a moment.'}
{3: 'Earlier that day, a person in black delivered it to her as arranged.'}
{3: 'Inside the brown envelope are non-sequential bills wrapped in newspaper.'}
{3: 'Also enclosed is a visiting lecturer invitation from the Hydrangea Island Medical Center.'}
{3: 'The school nurse quietly closes the drawer, walks to the window, and pulls out another cigarette. This time, she lights it.'}
{3: 'At home, she has two daughters and a sick mother to care for and they desperately need the money.'}
{3: "The infirmary window overlooks the athletic field, where the girls' volleyball team practices in the setting sun."}
{3: 'The school gates stand wide open in the distance—today is both the open day and school festival of Misono High.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1056.jpg'}
{3: 'Near the school building, Yata leans lazily against the wall, waiting for Yuka to finish changing her shoes.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: 'Classes running late today? Sorry, I ditched after lunch.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'Sorry for the wait. I went to the infirmary because I sneezed last night.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "Hey Yuka, there's the school festival and the island's fireworks show tonight. Let's go together!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'Oh... I remember there was a shop last year that specialized in making Noh masks.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'Noh masks? What are those? Are you interested in them, Yuka?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "Yes, I'm really fond of the white fox masks. Would you mind coming with me to take a look later?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "Of course! But you'll have to come with me to get some food first!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "Sure, let's do that.", 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg4901_02.jpg'}
{3: 'Shops line the streets from the school grounds outward, their colorful lanterns and storefront signs intertwining.'}
{3: 'Students in their uniforms weave through the streets in small groups, creating a scene of unprecedented liveliness.'}
{3: 'The aroma of cumin mingles with the sweet scent of flowers as couples lay out picnic blankets beneath the cherry blossom trees for flower viewing.'}
{3: 'Amidst the bustling crowd, the night sky glows with a fierce crimson, illuminated by the festivities below.'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "I'm gonna try every single fried and grilled snack on this street, hahaha!"}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "Never thought we'd run into people from outside Misono here."}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "The school clubs are all hoping to make a killing today—I mean, they're all hoping to show off their talents."}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'I just saw the Percussion Club setting up their drums. Looks like even those guys want a piece of the action.'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'Hey, Yata, please wait!'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'Noh Masks Limited? Is this the mask shop you were talking about?'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1075.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0.25'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Shop Owner', 3: 'Oh my, what a pleasant surprise! What can I interest you ladies in?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "I'd like a fox deity mask. Could you help me pick out a nice design?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Shop Owner', 3: 'With your beauty, miss, any of them would suit you perfectly. Would you like to give our latest design a try?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The shop owner hands the fox mask to Yuka, who immediately puts it on.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "It's actually quite breathable. What do you think, Yata?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: 'Woah... That is definitely a work of art... You feel completely different now with the mask on.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'Where did this classical elegance come from? I guess a beautiful face makes any mask work!', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Shop Owner', 3: 'Simply breathtaking, miss. Your beauty is like the bright moon veiled in mist.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Shop Owner', 3: 'At first glance, you look like the fox deity herself! Even Princess Kaguya would pale in comparison.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "With those praises, now I'm starting to worry if this will draw too much attention to me...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'As far as the design goes, I really like it.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "Let's go, Yata.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: 'Do you want some dango and grilled chicken? I got too many to finish by myself.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "It smells wonderful, but I can't handle food that's too greasy.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'You can treat me next time.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "Then, I'm gonna finish all of it!", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Roadside Shop 1', 3: "Hey Yata, want to try our shop's popcorn chicken? We've got a special secret sauce!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: "Thanks, I'll take half a portion to go.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Roadside Shop 2', 3: "Yata, bet you've never tried our fried ice cream before!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Roadside Shop 3', 3: "Oh, and don't forget our signature meat patties, fried in olive oil and milk!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: 'Could you pack that in a bag for me, please?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Roadside Shop 4', 3: 'Hey Yata, want your fortune told? From crystal balls to tarot cards, take your pick!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: "Well, why don't you tell me if I'll break any records in the next competition?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "Looks like... everyone from the clubs knows you. You've become quite the VIP around here, Yata.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "Don't worry. I'll burn all these calories off with a half-marathon tomorrow.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "It's a bit bittersweet... all of last year's prize money from the competition went up in smoke on this street.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'As they talk, a pale yellow firework blooms in the night sky in the distance.'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'Has the fireworks started?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "Hey Yuka, let's walk along the riverside!", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1075.jpg'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory373.png', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0.25'}
{3: "Before she even finishes her sentence, Yata grabs Yuka's hand and weaves through the crowd, diving into a small grove."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'Yata, why are we taking this path? There are so many mosquitoes...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'Let me tell you why! This is actually a shortcut to the riverside that I discovered last year.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "If we go through the main road, we'd run into a wall of loving couples there.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'Standing behind all those lovey-dovey couples would just put me in a bad mood.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'A wall, huh...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'Hey, come on, keep up!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Against the backdrop of distant, sporadic fireworks, the two of them weave their way through the dense forest.'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory367.png', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0'}
{3: 'Amidst rustling leaves and low vegetation, two figures descend the steps of the forest pavilion side-by-side.'}
{3: "A beautiful woman holds onto a man's arm, covering her mouth as she laughs and whispers to him. They look every bit like a couple in love."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yoshihiro Osako', 3: 'Ms. Saotome, are you drunk?!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yoshihiro Osako', 3: "Please hold yourself together. You don't want people to see you like this, now do you? There are students of yours around here.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'Haha, are you always this timid, Yoshihiro?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "Didn't you confess to me back in our school days? Or am I remembering it wrong?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yoshihiro Osako', 3: "That's all in the past now...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'I remember how red your face was when you cornered me outside the classroom that morning.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yoshihiro Osako', 3: "Sigh... What an embarrassing memory... You had quite a few admirers back then, and I didn't want to be the last guy in the world to go after you.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "So, what's wrong with meeting with an old friend? Or perhaps... you were expecting something more?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yoshihiro Osako', 3: 'Give me a break... You were the one who lured me here saying this was going to be some "academic discussion"...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "How is your wife doing? I don't believe I saw her during my last visit.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yoshihiro Osako', 3: 'She passed away from cancer when Masao was still young.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "I'm very sorry to hear that...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yoshihiro Osako', 3: "It's alright. I've come to terms with it after all these years.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "It's been so long...", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Reika pulls his arm closer to her body.'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "Don't you ever feel lonely?"}
{3: 'Taken aback, Yoshihiro furrows his brows and pulls his hand away from Reika.'}
{2: 'Yoshihiro Osako', 3: 'Right now, all I care about is raising Masao. I have no capacity for anything else.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'Really?', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Reika tidies her disheveled hair, her smile unwavering.'}
{3: 'At that moment, fireworks burst in the sky, illuminating their faces in clarity.'}
{3: "Reika's lips move, but her words are drowned out by the thundering fireworks."}
{2: 'Yoshihiro Osako', 3: 'What did you say just now?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "I asked if you'd like to join me by the riverside. There's a fireworks festival tonight.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yoshihiro Osako', 3: 'All right.', 4: '1'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory367.png', 3: '1', 4: '0', 5: '0'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1076.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "It's nice and quiet here, and the view of the fireworks is absolutely perfect from this spot.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "It's nice and quiet here, and the view of the fireworks is absolutely perfect from this spot.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'The breeze here during summer is so refreshing that you might just drift off into a comfortable nap.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "Be careful, though. It's slippery here around these tetrapods. It's all muddy and gross down there.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "Never mind that—look! Isn't it beautiful? The fireworks are getting closer to us.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Brilliant bursts of color bloom one after another across the night sky.'}
{3: 'Yuka narrows her eyes, the various patterns of light dancing in her pupils.'}
{3: 'Round and flat, fireworks of every shape burst into brilliance before dissolving into wisps of white smoke that hover above the water.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "The fireworks... they're beautiful. Fleeting yet enchanting.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'Hey, Yuka, wanna take a picture together?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'Just a second.', 4: '2'}
{3: "Yuka instinctively reaches for her waist, but the shoulder strap of her bag isn't there."}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'Oh no, my bag...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "You can't find it?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'Maybe it got caught on a branch when we were rushing through the woods?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "Why don't we check the lost and found later?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'No... my med...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "No, I have to go back right now! Someone might take it if we don't hurry.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "Yata, I'm sorry, but I really have to go now...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "Dr. Saotome is going to be really upset if I lose my bag... There's something really important in there.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Yuka backs away while apologizing to Yata, her pale face etched with fear.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: "Wait, Yuka, what's wrong?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "I'm sorry, Yata... This is all my fault. I always mess everything up.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "I'm so useless... Please forgive me... Please forgive me... Doctor...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'Stop apologizing already. You only came with me through the shortcut because I said so, remember?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "I'll just wait here for you!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Before Yata even finishes talking, Yuka has already staggered into the forest, nearly tripping over her own feet.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: "Hey, be careful! Don't run!", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory373.png'}
{3: 'A man and woman walk side by side through the tranquil forest.'}
{3: 'What was once an abandoned field of weeds just a year ago is now beyond recognition.'}
{3: 'Neatly arranged bamboo leaves line both sides of the path, which has been newly paved with white gravel.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yoshihiro Osako', 3: 'What a wonderful place. How did you come across it, Ms. Saotome?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "This is my secret hideaway. Thought I'd take you here today for a private hangout. Just the two of us, Yoshihiro.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yoshihiro Osako', 3: "Oh... Don't say stuff so misleading.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yoshihiro Osako', 3: 'There was absolutely nothing here when I last visited. When did it become so beautiful?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "It's part of the island's new development project. Look over there—they were planning to build a pavilion.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yoshihiro Osako', 3: "I see you're incredibly well-informed about this place. Would have been great if there were a lake here, though.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'The Gardening Association invited me for a site visit, and I fell in love with this place right away.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'I pulled some strings—just a tiny bit of influence—and they gave me permission to bring guests here anytime.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yoshihiro Osako', 3: 'I heard you have a degree in landscape architecture. Looks like those rumors are true.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "Oh, I dabble here and there. It's just a hobby to help me unwind.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yoshihiro Osako', 3: "That's amazing! So you're not just a scientist but a gardening expert as well.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'Please, come this way.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "There's the lake you wanted to see.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'They duck under the overhanging branches as they walk along the cobblestone path.'}
{3: 'Without warning, several fireworks explode in the sky with a deafening blast.'}
{3: 'Reika loses her footing and stumbles, but Yoshihiro catches her before she falls.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yoshihiro Osako', 3: 'And you called me timid? Look who just jumped at the fireworks!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "Well, they kept getting closer! I might seem tough and all, but I'm still a woman at the end of the day.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yoshihiro Osako', 3: 'They seem to launch a set every few minutes... Must be computer-controlled timing...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'Yes, exactly 5 minutes and 23 seconds between each launch.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yoshihiro Osako', 3: "You have quite the memory, don't you?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'My memory has been photographic since I was a child. I memorized the timing on our way here.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yoshihiro Osako', 3: "A prodigy from the start, huh? No wonder you're so successful.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The two of them exchange casual words as they stroll along the quiet path.'}
{3: "Time slips by unnoticed until Yoshihiro's legs start to ache. He looks around for a place to rest."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yoshihiro Osako', 3: 'Reika, are there any pavilions around here where we could take a break?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yoshihiro Osako', 3: 'Reika?', 4: '1'}
{3: "Yoshihiro looks around, only to see that Reika isn't following him anymore."}
{3: 'Several ribbon-like trails of fireworks ascend to the highest point in the sky.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryBianHong.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: 'Half a second later, a deafening boom fills the air.'}
{3: 'Two explosions—one near, one far.'}
{3: 'Yoshihiro turns to look at Reika and finds her gazing back at him with a gentle smile.'}
{3: 'But this time, her smile carries a trace of melancholy and sorrow, unlike anything before...'}
{3: 'Gone is her usual pretentious flattery, replaced by the innocent smile of a young girl.'}
{3: 'Yoshihiro reaches for his chest, his fingers meeting something wet and sticky.'}
{3: "Even in the darkness of the night, he knows it's blood seeping from his chest."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yoshihiro Osako', 3: 'I see...', 4: '1'}
{3: "Reika lowers her gun and slowly walks to Yoshihiro's side."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "I have to proceed with the consciousness projection experiment, and I'm sorry I had to break it to you like this.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yoshihiro Osako', 3: 'What gun did you use, Reika?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'A Glock 43.', 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryJianXue.prefab', 2: '3'}
{3: 'Reika embraces Yoshihiro, presses the gun against his abdomen, and fires two more shots.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryJianXue.prefab'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'Do you remember the question I asked you earlier?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'What is the sharpest of blades?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'Indeed, there are many remarkable blades in this world, each type with its own distinctive strengths.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'However, a weapon that cannot kill is nothing more than an ornament.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'Yoshihiro, those blades of yours that adorn the entire wall are magnificent.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "As decorative pieces, they're quite splendid.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Reika wipes down the pistol with a cloth, then she places it between Yoshihiro's thumb and index finger."}
{3: 'Yoshihiro collapses to the ground, motionless, as blood pools around him.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryBianHong.prefab'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'Kouhei.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Behind the bamboo leaves nearby, a tall, slender figure materializes like a specter.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'Clean this up. Make it look convincing.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Reika wipes her hands clean as she walks toward Kouhei.'}
{3: 'Just at that second, hurried footsteps rustle through nearby bushes...'}
{3: 'Reika whips around at the sound, while Kouhei immediately draws his gun from his waist.'}
{3: 'The branches rustle, and within moments, a high school girl in a Misono High uniform emerges.'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'D-Dr. Saotome?', 4: '1'}
{3: "Yuka's widened eyes fall upon Yoshihiro Osako, who lies motionless in a pool of blood."}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'Dr. Saotome... Wh-what is...', 4: '1'}
{3: "When Yuka turns back to Reika, she finds herself staring down the barrel of Kouhei's gun."}
{3: "Reika reaches out and gently lowers Kouhei's tension-stiffened arm."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "Kouhei, don't point your gun at a child.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Looking at Yuka, Reika forces her face into a twisted, unnatural smile.'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'Yuka, why are you... here tonight?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'Watching fireworks? Who did you go with? Was it with your friend Yata?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Reika steps toward Yuka, who backs away in fear.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "It's alright, Yuka. Come here.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "What you saw was just an accident. Don't worry about it.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Reika approaches Yuka with measured steps, then gently embraces her.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "There, there. You'll forget all about this soon.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "Dr. Saotome, did you... I'm sorry, but did you... kill him...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'Does that bother you, Yuka?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "No, I... I... What you did was right... wasn't it?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "Yes, we are in the right. Those who don't understand us are the ones who are wrong.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "About Yata... it's better if you don't mention this to her, all right?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'Yes... Y-yes, of course.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "That's my good girl. You'll do as your mother says, won't you?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The word "mother" seems to snap Yuka out of her daze.'}
{3: 'As if falling into a comforting illusion, she breaks into a smile.'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'Yes, I will listen to everything you say.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "You're my everything, Dr. Saotome...", 4: '2'}
{3: "Tears stream down Yuka's face even as she smiles."}
{3: "Reika releases her embrace and gently pats Yuka's head with feigned motherly affection."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "Yuka, the experiment you'll be part of is of paramount importance. It could change the future of humanity.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "Are you willing to take this risk for humanity? I'll be frank—I'm worried about you.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'If you want to back out, tell me now. Kouhei here can bear witness to what you say, too.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "Don't worry, Yuka. I'll listen to what your heart has to say.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "If this is your vision, Dr. Saotome, I'll do anything... absolutely anything...", 4: '2'}
{3: "Reika bends down and plants a kiss on Yuka's forehead."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'For now, stay here.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'Y-yes...', 4: '2'}
